title: Fragments [2], 18th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs
description: Two fragments of woven fabric showing offset rows of small flowers (alternate rows counterfaced) on top of violet stripes on a yellow background patterned with tiny yellow flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments [2], 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk. Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs. 1978-168-13-a,b.
